title: Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymia)
description: A comprehensive guide to Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymia), including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Persistent Depressive Disorder (Dysthymia) is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Depressive Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
